divs: Sighting DetailsI'm a photographer, and take quite alot of storm pictures, and sunset pictures etc. I've been doing this for the last 30 years. On July 10, 2007,about 9:25 pm, I was taking sunset pictures from my deck. I was facing west, and there was a cloud. The sun was down on the horizon behind the cloud. I took 10 to 15 shots. I came in and put the camera down. I was using my digital. I watched tv for about 2 hours, and decided to look at the pictures before I went to bed, to see if I got anything worth keeping. I wondered what in the world that big white spot was on one of the pictures. I loaded the pictures in my computer, so I could crop and zoom in on the subject. I also used a solarizing technique on it too. I'm going to try to send the picture on here so you can see it. I do not remember seeing the object as I was taking the picture. It must have went in and out real fast. I also have a picture (the one right before the white light) that shows a little faint spot that might be the same thing behind the cloud, but that is very questionable. It was midnight when I found the light on the picture, and didn't go to bed till 2am, and then couldn't sleep at all. I had a sighting on May 24th, which I posted on here, and this light, looked to be the same thing I saw before, but alot closer. The other sighting, was at Meijers in Kokomo. When I see the picture, I just can't believe I didn't see it through the viewfinder on the camera at the time I took it. It's so obvious. It's just weird, to see something two different times in like 6 weeks. Now it's kind of taking up alot of my time, because I keep looking west at the same time every night, and have a feeling of being watched. I spend alot of time now researching, that I didn't do before. Anyway I hope this picture goes through for you to see. If anyone has a good explaination, I'd love to hear it!
Summary: I was taking sunset pictures, and got something else I hadn't planned on.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Tipton
There were no other sightings in Tipton on or around July 10th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
